name: Sesame Street: Elmo's A-to-Zoo Adventure - The Videogame
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo Wii (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

JOIN ELMO AND ZOE ON AN ALPHABET ADVENTURE!

    Learning can be fun with the help of Sesame Street characters!
  • Fosters literacy skills, including letter identification, letter sounds, and word families.
  • Features easy to follow audio-visual directions
  • Use a second Wii Remote to drop-in and assist when needed.
  • Game difficulty adapts to your child's level.
